meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nancy Burke Bill Vogel Dean Miller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1041.

td.p: Nancy Burke, a secretary from Buffalo, New York
Bill Vogel, a phys. ed. teacher originally from Bayport, New York
Dean Miller, a restaurant manager from Gaithersburg, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,100)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "B"
PLAYS
COOKING
U.S.A.
BASEBALL
LEFTOVERS
(Alex: Very similar to Potpourri; these are clues left over from previous matches.)
